S.FORM: Anthony Bowie sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1963, ryax sa tay 9 nqu tay 11, Anthony Bowie, squliq na p'unro. qnxan nya Anthony Bowie htagan beh sa Tulsa,Oklahoma. 2003 kawas maki Bishop Moore High School's pcbaq seto. qyanux nya hopa pqwasan biru Anthony Bowie tmasot gocyu pqwasan biru lga,1982 1984 kawas maki Seminole State mzyu mari,1984 1986 kawas maki Oklahoma mzyu mari.
